title: U.S. STOCKS ON THE MOVE-Boeing, CBS, U.S. casinos, big banks, oil cos - Nasdaq.com
text: U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday as data showed factory activity shrank for the first time since 2016 in August, renewing fears that a drawn-out trade war between the United States and China could tip the world's largest economy into recession.

Boeing: Falls on fears of further delays to 737 MAX return

 ** CBS Corp : down 2.9%

CBS, Viacom: Down after brokerage cuts PT on deal
